name: Hard Cover
description:
Play in full screen! Otherwise some information may be obstructed.

A resource-management stealth game where you play as Amanda, a woman in the 1900s trying to break away from societal pressure and get into a local university in Singapore in the 1900s. 

Goals: 
- Obtain 100% knowledge by reading books before the entrance exams in 14 days
- Earn $250 to afford the University school fees
- Avoid getting caught reading, or skipping out on work too much! 

Controls: 
- [A] / [D] to move
- [E] to interact
- [Space] to use item/sleep/work at workplace
- Point and left-click for everything else!
